channel.title: Muted for 2 days? For what?
channel.description:
Hello,
I just logged into my Rune|Scape account to find it has been muted for 2 days. I don't event know what I did to even get this mute. So, I went over to the appeal and offense and hoped to see if it had anything about why I was muted. Turns out that there was nothing there about this said mute and my account is still in the Green Zone. Now, I am waiting and waiting to hear something from Jagex about why I was muted. Anyway, I don't really know what to do other than what I am doing now. I wish I could post on the R|S forums but I can't because I am muted and "banned" from the forum while the mute lasts. I just felt like telling someone about this, if anyone will even care. I am at least glad I got it out of myself into words.
-Ghostly150

item.title: Muted for 2 days? For what?
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

I still have not received any evidence of the offense from a J-Mod yet. It’s been practically the 2 days now, however, I still want to know why I was muted in the first place.

Edit: Oops! I looked at it wrong. I still have one more day of being muted. That still gives Jagex time to review it and show evidence. (I hope…) I don’t mind being muted so much as not knowing why.

Read full topic

item.title: Muted for 2 days? For what?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

A P-mod muted me 2-3 months ago, and the mute was reviewed over jagex’s systems, and in hours I was unmuted.

Read full topic

item.title: Muted for 2 days? For what?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

Don’t they message your account and quote what you said that got you muted. I know they did that when one of my accounts was muted.

Read full topic

item.title: Muted for 2 days? For what?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

This same problem happened to me… I was playing runescape how I play runescape (swearing by mods, not at them, nothing to get me really muted… if they had their censor on, it wouldn’t have said anything), and I got muted for 2 days. Wait a while and it will show up in your offense inbox or whatever it’s called.

Read full topic

item.title: Muted for 2 days? For what?
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

Wintercanon:

It’s an online mmo. Sometimes you pwn, sometimes you get pwnd. This is just another instance of you getting pwnd.

I lol’d. I guess you could be right in this sense. Interesting…

Edit: Wewt! Only one day left at least now… I can’t wait to talk again, I have a clan to run.

Read full topic

item.title: Muted for 2 days? For what?
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

kronixz:

who cares?

I don’t really care either if anyone cares about this, I’m just happy to get my feelings out. If you don’t care, then why even post? Lol

Read full topic

item.title: Muted for 2 days? For what?
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

kronixz:

who cares?

You obviously to, to have the urge to write that, unwanted comment.

item.title: Muted for 2 days? For what?
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

Why me though? Why now of all times?

Read full topic

item.title: Muted for 2 days? For what?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“ghostly150, post:3, topic:418727”][quote author=tinyscape link=topic=521271.msg3787646#msg3787646 date=1319017922]
Player moderator owned you.
[/quote]

Maybe, but there were no P-mods anywhere near me today I am pretty sure. Maybe there was. The last thing I was doing though I was at Clan Camp recruiting for my clan. But I swear I hardly spoke except when I was having basic conversations with people. I don’t spam. :|[/quote]
A two-day-mute is not that bad though, at least it wasn’t permanent and I’m guessing Jagex hasn’t gotten to the report because they check all mutes made by moderator at least they say the do, which could be a lie. Anyway, just wait for two days.

Read full topic

item.title: Muted for 2 days? For what?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:

[quote=“ghostly150, post:3, topic:418727”][quote author=tinyscape link=topic=521271.msg3787646#msg3787646 date=1319017922]
Player moderator owned you.
[/quote]

Maybe, but there were no P-mods anywhere near me today I am pretty sure. Maybe there was. The last thing I was doing though I was at Clan Camp recruiting for my clan. But I swear I hardly spoke except when I was having basic conversations with people. I don’t spam. :|[/quote]
P-mods don’t often talk, you know how annoying it is talking ingame and having people swarm you asking questions?
